attributes.title: do not like
attributes.review: horrible app !! had major issues such as crashing, draining battery quicker than normal, banning stuff when mad, AND being hypocritical !!

attributes.title: DELETE THIS APP
attributes.review: this app kept making my phone crash! not only do i believe it is infested with viruses, but i heard that it tracks your location. worst app i’ve ever downloaded.

attributes.title: Trump turned my phone into a tracker.
attributes.review: I’m sorry, you want to track my location even when the app isn’t open? No. I’m not doing that.

attributes.title: How can he get a kiss kiss
attributes.userName: how can he get a kiss kiss
attributes.review: He has no lips ! How would he get a kiss kiss, very ugly no kiss for him HAHAHAHAHA. Anyways I downloaded this app to see what our 🤡 of a president had in plan for us but my finger slipped and that’s how I wrote this review and gave the rating . :)

attributes.title: #savetiktok
attributes.review: You think you and your administration can get away with taking our app well if we can’t have our app you can’t have youres😈

attributes.title: HELP
attributes.review: I open the app to see an orange hippo trying to work out. I was hoping to see some reasons why he’s just a president but really none of that made sense or none of them are relevant also SAVE  TIKTOK.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Their are no words to describe how much I hate this app. There's no point of it even existing. 😑💀. Having this app is like immediately putting a virus on your phone. 👾

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: this app hacked all of my social media’s and took my data when i put it in. it ruined me!!! it’s very slow, not convienent, and should not be able to download!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see the news and it was lagging my phone out and made my phone run slower and all I was trying to do is “support” the hot Cheeto head president.

attributes.title: Trump is the worst🤮
attributes.review: This is the worst app I would never recommend getting it when i am on This app  all of my dogs get annoyed because of all of the noises that is coming out of my phone. This app is the WOOOOOOORRRRRSSSSTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!!!!!
